name: Lost Square
description:
Square is lost in a tron like / video game like world, just as the name says.

This is a project for a university class in which Rudá Moreira was the producer and scrum master to make this project in about 6 weeks.
Rodrigo Sieben and Jackson Willrich were programmers.
Natalie Valente and Leonardo Neves were sound designers.
Nohan Dias and João Matheus were artists.

Features:
  • Infinite Runner
  • Automatic power up progression (Jump Sustain and Dash)
  • Obstacles
  • Collectibles bits
  • Score
